title: Small business: the company you keep
creator_credit: Paul Ellis, Tony Matthews and BBC-TV
brief_description: How to approach the problems of delegation, staff selection, and the future management of the company. As a business grows, those at the top must learn a new role. In addition to delegation, which is examined from several angles, there are important problems of communication and industrial relations.
